document.masterDocTitle: Replacement name for the cicada genus Pycnoides Sanborn, 2020 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadinae: Platypleurini) and sixteen new combinations

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Replacement name for the cicada genus Pycnoides Sanborn, 2020 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Cicadinae: Platypleurini) and sixteen new combinations

subSubSection.paragraph:
has come to my attention that
Pycnoides
is a preoccupied name. Emelijanov (1964) ( Hemiptera : Cicadellidae : Deltocephalinae : Athysanini ) published
Pycnoides
as a subgeneric name,
Handianus ( Pycnoides ) Emelijanov, 1964
, prior to the publication of my genus. Therefore,
Pycnoides Sanborn
is a junior homonym under Article 53.2 and must be given a new name under Articles 23 and 52 (ICZN, 1999). As a result, I propose
Dyticopycna
nomen novum as a replacement name for
Pycnoides Sanborn, 2020
following Article 60 of the Code (ICZN, 1999). The new genus name is a combination of Dytico- (Gr. dytikos , western) and
â€“ pycna
to indicate the western distribution of the genus compared to the true species of
Pycna
along with the previous generic assignment of most species. The gender of the proposed genus is feminine.

The type species of
Dyticopycna
nom. nov.
is Cicada
semiclara Germar, 1834
following Recommendation 60A and Articles 67.8 and 72.7 of the Code (ICZN, 1999). The sixteen species currently placed in
Pycnoides Sanborn
,
Pycnoides antinorii ( Lethierry, 1881 )
,
Pycnoides baxteri ( Distant, 1914 )
,
Pycnoides becarrii ( Lethierry, 1881 )
,
Pycnoides dolosa ( Boulard, 1975a )
,
Pycnoides hecuba ( Distant, 1904 )
,
Pycnoides moniquae ( Boulard, 2012 )
,
Pycnoides natalensis ( Distant, 1905 )
,
Pycnoides neavei ( Distant, 1912 )
,
Pycnoides passosdecarvalhoi ( Boulard, 1975b )
,
Pycnoides quanza ( Distant, 1899a )
,
Pycnoides semiclara ( Germar, 1834 )
,
Pycnoides sylvia ( Distant, 1899b )
,
Pycnoides umbelinae ( Boulard, 1975b )
,
Pycnoides vitrea ( Schumacher, 1913 )
,
Pycnoides vitticollis ( Jacobi, 1904 )
, and
Pycnoides zambiaensis Sanborn, 2020
, become
Dyticopycna
nom. nov.
to become
Dyticopycna antinorii ( Lethierry, 1881 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna baxteri ( Distant, 1914 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna becarrii ( Lethierry, 1881 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna dolosa ( Boulard, 1975a )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna hecuba ( Distant, 1904 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna moniquae ( Boulard, 2012 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna natalensis ( Distant, 1905 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna neavei ( Distant, 1912 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna passosdecarvalhoi ( Boulard, 1975b )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna quanza ( Distant, 1899a )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna semiclara ( Germar, 1834 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna sylvia ( Distant, 1899b )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna umbelinae ( Boulard, 1975b )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna vitrea ( Schumacher, 1913 )
n. comb.
,
Dyticopycna vitticollis ( Jacobi, 1904 )
n. comb.
, and
Dyticopycna zambiaensis ( Sanborn, 2020 )
n. comb.
